mapper.select: SELECT prgrm_sn, prgrm_id, prgrm_url, prgrm_nm, prgrm_level, prgrm_ordr, up_prgrm_id, RLS_YN, register_id, reg_ymd, updusr_id, updt_ymd FROM PRGRM WHERE prgrm_sn=#{prgrmSn}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY prgrm_ordr, prgrm_sn ASC) AS rownum, prgrm_sn, prgrm_id, prgrm_url, prgrm_nm, prgrm_level, prgrm_ordr, up_prgrm_id, RLS_YN, register_id, reg_ymd, updusr_id, updt_ymd FROM PRGRM WHERE 1=1
AND prgrm_id LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND prgrm_nm LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY prgrm_ordr, prgrm_sn ASC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY prgrm_ordr, prgrm_sn ASC) AS rownum, prgrm_sn, prgrm_id, prgrm_url, prgrm_nm, prgrm_level, prgrm_ordr, up_prgrm_id, RLS_YN, register_id, reg_ymd, updusr_id, updt_ymd, (SELECT CASE COUNT(*) WHEN 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END FROM prgrm_author PA WHERE PA.prgrm_sn = P.prgrm_sn AND PA.author_cd = 'US') AS author_user_yn, (SELECT CASE COUNT(*) WHEN 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END FROM prgrm_author PA WHERE PA.prgrm_sn = P.prgrm_sn AND PA.author_cd = 'OP') AS author_oper_yn, (SELECT CASE COUNT(*) WHEN 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END FROM prgrm_author PA WHERE PA.prgrm_sn = P.prgrm_sn AND PA.author_cd = 'AD') AS author_admn_yn FROM PRGRM P WHERE 1=1
AND prgrm_id LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND prgrm_nm LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY prgrm_ordr, prgrm_sn ASC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PRGRM WHERE 1=1
AND ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
